content: **knitted socks / ankle-socks in stocking stitch in drops fabel sizes 35 - 43 ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern fa-493 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** 35/37 - 38/40 - 41/43 foot-length 22-24-27 cm leg height approx 3-3-4 cm **materials** drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-50-100 g colour 114 light pearl grey needles drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm **knitting gauge** 26 stitches in width and 34 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
